DYCD Youth Connect
April 25, 2019 at 3:25 PM ·

If you are between the ages of 14 and 24, you can apply for a paid summer experience through the Summer Youth Employment Program (SYEP). Participants have the opportunity to explore their interests and career pathways, develop workplace skills and engage in learning experiences that help in developing their social, civic and leadership skills. For more information and to apply before the Friday, April 26 deadline, visit on.nyc.gov/2D9sphB.

This year, young adults aged 22 - 24 interested in SYEP have to apply using paper applications and meet additional eligibility requirements. Please, send us a direct message or call our Youth Connect hotline at 800-246-4646 for more details.
